BILL.name: Medical Bill / Statement
BILL.description: A request for payment from a healthcare provider

EOB.name: Explanation of Benefits
EOB.description: A statement from your insurance explaining how a claim was processed - NOT a bill

CLINICAL.name: Clinical Document
CLINICAL.description: Medical records, visit summaries, or lab results

verifyInsuranceSubmission.title: Verify Bill Was Sent to Insurance
verifyInsuranceSubmission.script: Hi, I'm calling about account number {account_number}. I received a bill for ${amount} but I have insurance with {insurer_name}. Can you confirm this was submitted to my insurance? If not, can you submit it before I pay anything?
verifyInsuranceSubmission.followUp: If they say it was submitted, ask for the claim number and date submitted.

requestItemizedBill.title: Request Itemized Bill
requestItemizedBill.script: Hi, I'm calling about account number {account_number}. I'd like to request a fully itemized bill showing each individual charge with the billing codes. I understand I have a right to this under healthcare pricing transparency rules.
requestItemizedBill.followUp: They may mail or email it. Ask for a timeline.

askAboutPaymentPlan.title: Ask About Payment Plan
askAboutPaymentPlan.script: Hi, I'm calling about account number {account_number}. I received a bill for ${amount} and I'd like to set up a payment plan. What options do you have available? Is there an interest-free option?
askAboutPaymentPlan.followUp: Get the terms in writing before agreeing.

verifyEOBMatchesBill.title: Verify Bill Matches EOB
verifyEOBMatchesBill.script: Hi, I'm calling about account number {account_number}. I received my EOB from insurance showing I owe ${eob_patient_responsibility}, but my bill from you shows ${bill_amount}. Can you help me understand why these are different?
verifyEOBMatchesBill.followUp: The bill should match the EOB patient responsibility amount.

askAboutFinancialAssistance.title: Ask About Financial Assistance
askAboutFinancialAssistance.script: Hi, I'm calling about account number {account_number}. I'm having difficulty paying this bill. Do you have a financial assistance program or charity care I might qualify for? Can you send me an application?
askAboutFinancialAssistance.followUp: Non-profit hospitals are required to have financial assistance programs.

questionDenial.title: Question Claim Denial
questionDenial.script: Hi, I'm calling about claim number {claim_number} which was denied. The denial reason states {denial_reason}. Can you explain why this was denied and what I need to do to appeal? What documentation do you need?
questionDenial.followUp: Get the appeal deadline and process in writing.

reassuranceMessages.highBill: I know this bill might feel overwhelming, but you have options. Many people successfully negotiate medical bills or set up manageable payment plans. Let's look at what you can do.
reassuranceMessages.confusingDocument: Healthcare paperwork can be really confusing - you're not alone in feeling that way. Let me break this down into plain English for you.
reassuranceMessages.insuranceIssue: Insurance can be complicated, but understanding your EOB is the first step to making sure you're not paying more than you should. Let's figure this out together.
reassuranceMessages.default: Understanding your healthcare documents is an important step in taking control of your health and finances. I'm here to help make sense of it all.

insuranceNotSubmitted.message: This bill may not have been submitted to your insurance yet. Before paying, call to verify.

indicators: bill amount differs from EOB patient responsibility
billEOBMismatch.message: Your bill doesn't match what your EOB says you owe. This is worth clarifying before paying.

duplicate.message: This code appears more than once. This might be intentional, but it's worth verifying.
